behavior turn_on_dvd_player(remote_control: item, dvd_player: item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        achieve close_char(char, dvd_player)
        
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control] == 2052
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player) and id[dvd_player] == 2061
        
        turn_on_dvd_player(remote_control, dvd_player)

behavior turn_on_dvd_player(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        assert is_off(remote_control) # Ensure the remote control is off initially
        achieve is_on(remote_control) # Turn the remote control on
        achieve is_on(dvd_player) # Ensure the DVD player is turned on

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind couch_352: item where:
            is_couch(couch_352)
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and on(remote_control, couch_352)
        # Select the remote control found previously

        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player) and close(dvd_player, tvstand_353)
        # Select the DVD player found previously

        turn_on_dvd_player(remote_control, dvd_player)

behavior use_remote_control_on_dvd(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve close(remote_control, dvd_player)
        # Ensure the remote control is close to the DVD player
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)
        # Turn on the DVD player using the remote control

behavior __goal__():

        bind dvd_player: item where:

        # Select the DVD player with ID 2061
        
        use_remote_control_on_dvd(remote_control, dvd_player)
